definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to smoke/to fumigate/to assail the nostrils/to perfume
fragrance/warm/to educate/variant of 熏[xun1]/to smoke/to fumigate
to be eager for wealth and emolument (idiom)
lit. fragrant herbs and foul herbs do not go into the same vessel (idiom)/bad people and good people do not mix

sentences.english: The paper is then charred by a lamp or candle and the sewn pattern outline removed.
sentences.chinese: 拿到灯烛上用烟薰烤，烤黑，把剪纸图形取下。

sentences.english: Base notes are composed of dewy musk, vanilla, vetiver, and tonka bean.
sentences.chinese: 基本配方包含麝香，香草，岩兰草和薰豆。

sentences.english: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 我又用没药，沉香，桂皮，薰了我的榻。

sentences.english: The TCM group was given fumigating and washing of TCM besides above treatments.
sentences.chinese: 中药组除给予以上治疗外，加用中药薰洗治疗。

sentences.english: Marinated chicken dark meat, grilled and served with spicy and sour sauce.
sentences.chinese: 精选上等去骨鸡腿肉，以独门酱料腌渍后，上架薰烤。

sentences.english: A large mackerel or herring, lightly smoked and salted.
sentences.chinese: 一种体型较大的鲭鱼或鲱鱼，微用烟薰和盐腌。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of sitz bath with Chinese herbal fumigant on patients with proctologic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肛肠病患者术后应用中药薰洗坐浴的效果。

sentences.english: The hams were cured over a hickory fire.
sentences.chinese: 这些火腿是在山核桃木的火上薰制的。

sentences.english: For playing the piano and singing, still questions sword.
sentences.chinese: 为奏薰琴唱，仍题宝剑名。

sentences.english: Wormwood, Bergamot, Cardamom, Lavender, Orange Blossom, Cinnamon, Cumin, Wood, Musk, Amber, Vanilla, Tonka Bean.
sentences.chinese: 之后散发木，麝香，琥珀，香草和薰衣豆香。

definition: Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
